name: Pact Magic

notes: All Pact Magic slots are the same level; slot level determined by the Warlock table.
Slots recharge on short or long rest.

effects: you know two Warlock cantrips; when you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one of these cantrips
you gain additional Warlock cantrips at Warlock levels 4 and 10, as shown in the class table
you prepare Warlock spells of level 1+ from the Warlock spell list as shown in the class table
at level 1, prepare two level 1+ warlock spells
you regain all expended Pact Magic spell slots when you finish a short or long rest
Pact Magic slots are all the same level as shown in the class table
spellcasting focus: you can use an Arcane Focus
limits: when you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one prepared Warlock spell with another eligible Warlock spell
prepared spells must be of a level no higher than the slot level shown in the class table
always prepared: spells from other warlock features are always prepared and don't count against prepared spells
notes: This shard describes the Pact Magic spellcasting model at a high level.
Exact slot counts, slot level progression, and spells prepared are table-driven; store those in a separate class table shard if you ingest tables later.
